mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_SEQ, USER_ID, STATUS, REG_DATE, VIEW_DATE, TOTAL_AMOUNT, TID, EXHI_NAME, BRD_SEQ, QUANTITY FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ORDER_SEQ, USER_ID, STATUS, REG_DATE, VIEW_DATE, TOTAL_AMOUNT, TID, EXHI_NAME, BRD_SEQ, QUANTITY FROM (SELECT ORDER_SEQ, A.USER_ID, A.STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI'), '') REG_DATE, NVL(TO_CHAR(VIEW_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD'), '') VIEW_DATE, TOTAL_AMOUNT, TID, EXHI_NAME, A.BRD_SEQ, QUANTITY FROM SPR_ORDER A, SPR_BRD B WHERE A.BRD_SEQ = B.BRD_SEQ AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY A.ORDER_SEQ DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
